sqlitedatabases

Class ReservationsDatabase

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ReservationsDatabase
extends SQLiteDatabase
    Sets up SQLite database with columns: reservationID, userID, screeningID, seatID (varchar(3))

    Samuel Bradshaw
